name: Magician Casino 2 Vegas Slots
description:
The All New Magician Casino 2™ - Spellbinding Free Slots, Video Poker, Blackjack, Keno and Bingo games!

Magician Casino™ - one of the most popular real-world casino slot machine games – is now available for FREE on mobile devices and is better than ever with more free casino games to add to the fun!

Play this enchanting casino game FREE with a huge install coin bonus, daily coin bonuses and bi-hourly coin bonuses and you’re sure to have some magical casino fun.

Fancy a spin on a slot machine? A hand of Video Poker? Perhaps a round of Bingo? You’ll find everything from classic casino slots like The Magician, Wild Magic, or Joker’s Gold to casino video poker favorites like Multi-Strike Poker™. All these casino games are FREE in Magician Casino 2™ right now! The Magician will have you winning BIGGER JACKPOTS, MORE BLACKJACKS, BETTER POKER HANDS & MORE! All of the fun of a real Vegas Casino but with a whimsical host that will leave you spellbound...

***SPECTACULAR FEATURES***
Daily Magic!
Daily Magic Hat Pick Bonuses – pick the magic hats for up to 20,000 coins!
Magic Wheel Bonus – activate, spin the wheel, and get a guaranteed multiplier for your win!

In-Game Magic!
Wild Trails – dazzling free spins turning the entire reel WILD!
Pick the Lady – find the Queen of Hearts and increase your take by up to 12x after any winning spin
Locked-in Reels with a RE-SPIN BONUS – capture this bonus and reels re-spin, increasing your chances to win more even MORE!
The Magic Wand – replace oh-so-close symbols with walloping WINS when this wondrous wand appears
“Take-it-OR-Leave-it”– make a deal or take a chance with The Magician in this by-the-seat-of-your-pants mini-game!

*Mini-games – Hidden Quests – Bonus Features – Wilds – and Magical SURPRISES!*

Whether, you’re getting a BINGO, getting a top hand in POKER or hitting the JACKPOT on a slot machine, you’ll have more free FUN than you can shake a wand at!

Vegas style slots, poker, blackjack, keno and bingo games packed with fun tricks and topped-off with treasures! You’ll never know until you try Magician Casino 2™ - the ultimate spellbinding mobile slots experience!

Download Magician Casino 2™ now and see what magic awaits you!
